short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free TpT popup dashboard that updates and notifies you as you sell

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Google Chrome Extension is made to motivate new TeachersPayTeachers (TpT) Sellers. It updates as you sell and notifies you instantly about new sales.

New v2.3.5:
- Top Earners (Last 7 and 30 days) in Dashboard

- Track search rank results
- Analyze your products in-depth
- Explore sellers based on their live TpT ranking
- Utilize TpT's own popularity scores to make your products findable
- new TpT-Informer Market research tool right in your TpT dashboard

Quickview dashboard:
- get notified via a cha-ching sound for every sale you make!
- Set monthly goals ðŸ’°
- Update how many of your lasts sales you'd like to see
